msbt.message: The best coaches are the ones who can call quick, short plays. Your quick, short message meant the world to me. See you in the arena, bud!
Even though your message was short, your feelings really came across. Also, it was super short, so I was able to read it all the way to the end!
Are short letters all the rage now? Cool! I accept the challenge! Here goes! Oh man. I've already written way too much. You're way better at this than I am.
The card you sent proves the old saying, "Simpler is better." You put your thoughts into words, and I'm impressed. Although, you could write a bit more next time, if you want to.
Hey! Friends don't let friends slack off when it comes to letter writing! You're not getting a very good finger workout when you write so few words. Put your heart muscle into it next time!
Your letter was so short, it made me wonder if there was some sort of encrypted, hidden message there. I looked for hours, but I couldn't crack your code.
